title: IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Jammu has published the official notification for 2025. Allotted 02 vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 . Inte...
